first.text: Hello there! I'm Dash, your A.I assistant to answer all your travel concerns. You can ask me about flight availability, travel restrictions, or any other questions you may have for travelling purposes.

repeat.text: I'm always here ready to help for your travel advisory. You can ask me about flight availability, travel restrictions, or any questions you may have for travelling purposes.

first.text: I'll check the flight availability for you within the next week. Where are you from and where are you flying to?

repeat.text: I was just checking, where are you from and where are you flying to?

first.text: No problem, I can check that for you. Which country are you looking at?

repeat.text: I was just saying, which country are you looking at?

first.text: Here are the flights I've found within the next week.

repeat.text: I was just saying, here are the flights I've found within the next week.

first.text: Here are the travel restrictions I've found for

repeat.text: I was just saying, here are the travel restrictions I've found for

first.text: Here is what the overall covid situation looks like at

repeat.text: I was just saying, here is what the overall covid situation looks like at

first.text: Great! And I can hear you too. Bye!
You will excuse me if I find that highly unlikely. After all, you responded to me and I can hear you just fine. Peace out!

i_will_call_back.text: Okay, I'll call you later. Bye!

when_callback.text: When can I call you back?

random.text: Sorry, could you say it again?
Sorry, the connection dropped for a second. Could you say that again?
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
Could you say it one more time?

dont_understand_request.text: Sorry, i cant do it now. May be some day.

dont_understand_question.text: Sorry, i dont understand your question. Can you say it otherwise?

dont_understand_hangup.text: I'm sorry I can barely hear you. I'll try to call you later! Bye!

dont_understand_forward.text: I'm sorry, let me transfer you to another agent. Please stand by!

yes_i_am_a_robot.text: Actually I am an advanced AI. Just don't tell my boss or I'll be out of a job.

repeat_question.text: Can you repeat the question, please?
